title: Connection Issue Is Back Again
body:
@Riot

The issue from last week is back again for the 4th time in 1 weeks, unable to login!

replies.body: hiii riot wanna fix or address this please? :/ i'm in the same exact boat. none of the fixes helped, no repairing, re-installing, nothing. would be nice to see riot acknowledge that so many of us are having this issue.

I am glad that it's not on my side. I logged in just fine last night and I've been trying for a while now and no luck. I've tried all of the fixes recommended, uninstalled/reinstalled and still nothing. Grrrr.
Same here.  This is really annoying!!{{champion:1}}
for some reason many of my friends in a different area doesn't have the problem, so i am wonder if its a specific ISP, like Time Warner Cable
Yeah, i have TWC and the same exact problem.
Same problem here. Except we have Cox communications.
Fix the damn connection problems RITO! tired of 3000k ping lag spikes.
YES I GET DISCONNECTED IN RANKED AND DON'T GET A LOSS PREVENTED YES

BUMP. 

RITO DO YOUR DAMN JOB
https://downdetector.com/status/league-of-legends
Logged on this morning it was fixed. Don't know why but its working for me again.
heyo its back up!
i had this issue the whole day yesterday and logged in fine today.
pls!
So 24hrs and still no response that they even read the "Help & Support"... shows how much they care...

I'm getting this issue for the first time and I don't like it. I can't play league cause I can't log in. ;n; I've tried everything on the first page of google after typing in "lol can't connect to pvp.net", flushing dns, reinstalling league, disabling ip helper, disabling firewall, port fowarded to all league ports, running without and with administrator mode dozens of times, restarted my laptop multiple times, and all still nothing... I was fine the day after the patch but league just started to act up yesterday... I can oddly still login into LAN server but not NA.
BUMP!
same problem. bump.
same problem whats going on?
What's up with this... Yesterday it was all fine, and know not even a re-install will do anything.
Same here halp
Still no word from riot? This is unreal.
STILL DOESNT WORK....

I've tried absolutely every solution I could find. No luck.

pls
I was just playing last night and now this shiz starts up and I cannot log in at all... PBE and all other servers work fine.
same  here.
pls fix asap
Bump! Same issue, please fix
Bump!
Haven't been able to log in for over 3 hours now. I've tried everything including repair/reinstall
same
Pls fix riot

Ohhhhh, somewhere i'm happy to know i'm not the only one !!!! I tried to reboot my pc, uninstalled and reinstalled, i tried to repair but nothing to do.... Hope it's  going to be fixe quickly !!! I believe in riot :p
Same here i cant connect to the NA servers but i made a new acount in LAN and i connect there fine. seems like imma be on a diffrent region till this gets fixed :\{{champion:32}}
Same here. Roommate on the same internet can't log in either. If it is ISP related, then League isn't liking Time Warner Cable.
Same here. Shit sucks
You guys aren't the only ones
i been playing with 200-3000 ping all day and now i cant connect! HELP
